propSpec.name: min
propSpec.desc: A decimal defining the minimum value that can be plotted

propSpec.name: max
propSpec.desc: A decimal defining the maximum value that can be plotted

propSpec.name: value
propSpec.desc: A value to be displayed that, when passed, will set the spinner as determinate, and progress will be indicated

propSpec.name: loading
propSpec.desc: When true, the loading spinner will show
